summary: The psychological thriller "Murk" tells the story of Jacob, who is investigating into the circumstances surrounding his sister's death on her wedding night.
cast: Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Nicolas Bro|Laura Drasbæk|Lisbet Lundquist|Lotte Bergstrøm|Anne Sofie Espersen|Lærke Winther|Morten Lützhøft|Lars Lunøe|Søren Thomsen|Hother Bøndorff|Ane Vinther|Katrine Hartmann|Jørgen Lysemose
title: Mørke
